full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Title and Description
### English
[DND D200 Oven Exhaust Ventilation - DND Halifax, Nova Scotia][1]

### French
[Vention d’échappement pour un four industriel - Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN) Halifax, Nouvelle-Écosse][1]

### Details
* Reference Number: WS4457994865-Doc4458012632
* Solicitation Number: WS4457994865
* Publication Date: 2024-02-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-03-11 14:00:00

## Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for the removal and installation of ductwork and electrical components to support a new industrial oven at building D200, Halifax Dockyard. The work under this project includes the provision of labor, equipment, materials, and services necessary to complete the work. The estimated value of this opportunity ranges from $100,001 to $500,000.

## Requirements
* Delivery date: within 20 weeks of contract award
* Bid Security: required for the tender during Phase Two

## Other Information
* UNSPSC Codes:
	+ 56110000: Commercial and industrial furniture
	+ 72000000: Building and facility construction and maintenance services
	+ 72151200: HVAC construction and maintenance services
* Trade Agreements:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of opportunity: Nova Scotia

## Contact Information
* Adam Beaumaster (aderroûi.il / he-him)
	+ Email: adam\_beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

You can access the tender notification on the following webpage:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18889727

[1]: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_jjucxkDmJMt1S7dwmAMbBtybcLHK011uuSOY9d_Gw/edit#heading=h.gzbgl6tdhvyp
